description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6obqq","text":"A 6-plex immunofluorescence protocol was optimized on Leica Bond RX Autostainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5kr5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7vdu2","text":"Multiplex IF assay on the Bond RX Autostainer (Leica Biosystems) using the Opal multiplex IHC system (PerkinElmer/Akoya Biosciences Cat# NEL871001KT) and the BOND Polymer Refine Detection Kit (Leica Biosystems Cat# DS9800). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":223}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e17nn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"edv77","text":"- Prepare the antibody and the fluorophore dilutions in 6mL Leica BOND tubes (see Ficial M et al for details about reagents, dilutions and order of antibodies).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aqdvd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"va7v","text":"- Fill an empty 7ml Leica BOND container with DAPI.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"afm0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6njln","text":"- Fill an empty 30ml Leica BOND container with Dako Protein Block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5t002","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13ml8","text":"Bake the unstained FFPE slides in the Isotemp Oven for 30 mins at 60°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
